author: Weizhen Tan
title: Coronavirus live updates: China reports 30 new cases; White House says Americans need to prepare for more deaths
description: China's National Health Commission said there were 30 new confirmed cases as of April 21, and no new deaths were reported for the seventh straight day.
content:
This is CNBC's live blog covering all the latest news on the coronavirus outbreak. This blog will be updated throughout the day as the news breaks.
  • Global cases: At least 2,561,044.
  • Global deaths: At least 176,984.
  • Most cases reported… [+4613 chars]
